1#include "mconf.h"
2
3double gammasgn(double x)
4{
5 double fx;
6
7 if (isnan(x)) {
8 return x;
9 }
10 if (x > 0) {
11 return 1.0;
12 }
13 else {
14 fx = floor(x: x);
15 if (x - fx == 0.0) {
16 return 0.0;
17 }
18 else if ((int)fx % 2) {
19 return -1.0;
20 }
21 else {
22 return 1.0;
23 }
24 }
25}
